Articles.Content:
lol. I believe #1 on that list is "Get Squad's permission." Although I'd like to have something real to show them first.

Well that's why #3 is "???"

Profit could mean strictly personal satisfaction, unless #3 is legally greenlit to become SELL TO DEADWEASEL RIGHT NOW.

Well that's why #3 is "???"

Profit could mean strictly personal satisfaction, unless #3 is legally greenlit to become SELL TO DEADWEASEL RIGHT NOW.

Let's go with "Greenlit"
Could you make some patches for the Medwedian Space Program?

Could you make some patches for the Medwedian Space Program?

I'm terribly sorry, I'm not able to take on more projects for a while. I have an insane to-do list.

"Who made that Kerbal a gunner?"

Oh yes.

I really do love your work.

I really do love your work.

Thank you!
Oh, and this arrived a bit ago.

Wait.

Wait.

A...

shuttle mug?

Wait.

Wait.

A...

shuttle mug?

Yeah. It needs a bit of work on the RCS ports and thermal tiles, but she's almost ready. Hoping to have it up well before Christmas. SRBs and the external tank will go up soon after. Then lunar lander, ISS modules, HTV, ATV, etc.

I'm terribly sorry, I'm not able to take on more projects for a while. I have an insane to-do list.

Does this mean that you will not do my request EVER?

Does this mean that you will not do my request EVER?
I have to get through my current projects which could take months, what with the holidays interfering. We shall see. I'm a freelance artist, so my side-art time is limited.

OMG Kremlins?

Dude, something tells me we're in a similar age bracket.

OMG Kremlins?

Dude, something tells me we're in a similar age bracket.

I guess my choice of mashups gives me away. I'm a child of the 80's.

Tried my hand at a low-part resource flow that could still teach young students about the joys of ISRU. I figure this truncated flow would have 9 parts: 4 types of collectors (gas, liquid, subsurface dry, subsurface wet), 4 types of storage (general gas, general liquid, general materials, radioactive), and a processor to magically convert any of them (one process at a time of course).

Edited December 19, 2013 by Hayoo
Very nice! But seeing this chart only reminds me that we won't get resources in any sophisticated form

Very nice! But seeing this chart only reminds me that we won't get resources in any sophisticated form

Thanks. Well you never know what may change. We shall see.

Finished the shuttle mug design! As a proof-of-concept it turned out rather well (although I could do without drawing all those thermal tiles again). I am working on some designs inspired by KSP parts.

You can see the final artwork on my Deviantart page.

Edited January 2, 2014 by Hayoo
awesome job Hayoo, congratulations, I just go trough all the pages here, I'm amazed !

Tried my hand at a low-part resource flow that could still teach young students about the joys of ISRU. I figure this truncated flow would have 9 parts: 4 types of collectors (gas, liquid, subsurface dry, subsurface wet), 4 types of storage (general gas, general liquid, general materials, radioactive), and a processor to magically convert any of them (one process at a time of course).

http://spaceflightonline.net/images/kerbal_resource_flow_hayoo.jpg

Yeah, while Squad's resource idea may not have worked for end-game, I think the ISRU it waaaay too important to not be implemented in some form, even if it's as simple as Kethane.

Finished the shuttle mug design! As a proof-of-concept it turned out rather well (although I could do without drawing all those thermal tiles again). I am working on some designs inspired by KSP parts.

Yeah, while Squad's resource idea may not have worked for end-game, I think the ISRU it waaaay too important to not be implemented in some form, even if it's as simple as Kethane.

Agreed. I think fuel processing is definitely the minimum needed for any resource system.

Thought about it but I don't know if I'll have time to work on anything. I'm sure I'll get some free time to come up with something just after it's too late.

Thought about it but I don't know if I'll have time to work on anything. I'm sure I'll get some free time to come up with something just after it's too late.
